headline: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. Increases Cash Dividend to $0.65 per Share
summary: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. (NYSE: AJG) announced that its Board of Directors declared a sixty-five cents ($0.65) per share quarterly cash dividend on the company's common stock, a $0.05 increase over the prior quarter's dividend. The dividend will be payable on March 21, 2025 to Stockholders of Record as of March 7, 2025.
